sentence: Several Republican lawmakers, such as Reps. Paul Gosar, Andy Biggs, and Madison Cawthorn, have been targeted with similar lawsuits.
author: Ryan King
title: Marjorie Taylor Greene's lawyers attempt to block 'Marshall law' text from court record
